mapper.insert: insert into t_seckill_activity ( activity_name,activity_desc, start_time,end_time ) values ( #{seckillActivity.activityName},#{seckillActivity.activityDesc}, #{seckillActivity.startTime}, #{seckillActivity.endTime} )
mapper.select: select id from t_seckill_activity where start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{endTime} and activity_status = 0
